The club are delighted with Todibo. He has made good friends with Lenglet and Dembélé, but gets along well with all teammates. He is rushing to learn Spanish because he knows that this aspect is key to a good understanding with his teammates both on and off the pitch.

replies.msg:
https://www.fcbarcelona.com/en/football/first-team/news/1087232/sergi-samper-ill-never-forget-barca

"I want to prove myself, to see where I can get. I have a lot of confidence in myself and we'll see what happens in the future. I'm not afraid to leave, but I have respect for Barça, and I will never forget where I came from. I carry the Club in my heart."

Sergi Samper: "After wearing the Barça shirt for 18 years, I was encouraged. It is the club of my life and I will always love Barça. Now I will start a new adventure, Força Barça, today and always."

"Vissel Kobe? I want to play and enjoy football again. I talked to the club's owner, Mikitani, and he convinced me that I would be the key to a solid and ambitious project that want to play the Barça style. I also spoke with Iniesta."

"I would have liked to finish the season here and raise all the possible titles, but sometimes decisions must be made."

"Iniesta was key. He called me several times and told me Vissel Kobe is a good place to grow. Piqué was the first to warn me of the news, I am very grateful."

During the Liga Clasico in Madrid, Undiano Mallenco was pressed on why there had been no punishment for Ramos when he struck Messi in the face.

"It was a dive" was his response.

Samper: Iniesta was the key to me moving to Vissel Kobe.

He called me several times and told me that the club was good for development.

Lots of people packed in the room as Samper says goodbye to Barça -- Valverde, Pimi, his family. Loud round of applause as he finishes his speech. A few tears.

Samper: I want to play again, I want to enjoy football again. [Vissel Kobe] gives me that chance. The club's owner explained an ambitious project to me, convincing me I'd be key. They want to play Barça's style. [Iniesta] called me to convince me, too.

Samper says everything happened quickly over the last week since Pique (through his links with Rakuten) informed him of Vissel Kobe's interest

replies.msg:
Matthjis de Ligt is a priority for Barça and the club will do everything possible to sign him. The defender wants to join Barça and continue playing alongside De Jong at the Camp Nou. Due to the good relations with Ajax, De Ligt will cost less than De Jong.

Matthjis will be on the same pay scale as De Jong i.e. less than €10M gross per season. Barça has received information that Raiola will do what the player tells him despite his desire for Matthjis to play somewhere else before joining Barça. [@ffpolo]


A vital meeting is scheduled after the game against Lyon between Bartomeu, Jordi Mestre, Pep Segura, Abidal and Ramon Planes. A meeting where decisions for the future will be made. Potential targets like De Ligt and Luka Jovic will be on the table. [@MigRico]

replies.msg:
Valverde: "It is hard to win the 3 points in this league, and more when the end of the season approaches. All the teams fight to achieve their goals."

"Piqué is at a very good level, he is at an extremely good moment. He is playing many games, but he rested on Wednesday. We will see how tomorrow's line-up will look like."å“‡å¤šæ’šè¬å“‚

"It is possible that there will be changes in the line-up tomorrow. But we have had a week of rest there are four days of rest after the Rayo game before playing Lyon."

"Madrid? We have respect because we know how things can change in a week. Seeing that teams as powerful as them, and PSG, are eliminated warns us of how tough the Champions League is."

"Nothing makes me think that Rakitic is not with us next season."

"Umtiti is entering little by little and we hope that he will find his best level."

Boateng? I have to make a list, I have got five forwards and someone has to stay out, it is true that he was left out multiple times and he has to work to turn the situation around."

"Messi? We all knew he was going to return to the national team sooner or later, I do not worry. We take it normally."

"People should get excited about us, with the game, with the results, but we must be cautious."

"It is clear that if Arturo Vidal plays he is always going to give 100%."
